create or replace PACKAGE cmn_sde_tapi_pck
IS
-- Table API package for table cmn_sysconfig_data_types
-- Generated by VI TAPI generator version 6.2  (TAPI generated 03-Jan-2022  05:41:08)

-- Generated global constants
g_con_pack        CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(30) := 'CMN_SDE_TAPI_PCK';
g_con_table_name  CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(61) := 'CMN_SYSCONFIG_DATA_TYPES';
g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;


FUNCTION sde_select_row( i_sde_DOC_TYPE   IN  cmn_sysconfig_data_types.DOC_TYPE%TYPE
                       , o_rt_sde   OUT cmn_sysconfig_data_types%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION sde_select_row_upd( i_sde_DOC_TYPE   IN  cmn_sysconfig_data_types.DOC_TYPE%TYPE
                           , o_rt_sde   OUT cmn_sysconfig_data_types%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

PROCEDURE sde_lock_row( i_sde_DOC_TYPE   IN  cmn_sysconfig_data_types.DOC_TYPE%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE sde_lock_row_nowait( i_sde_DOC_TYPE   IN  cmn_sysconfig_data_types.DOC_TYPE%TYPE )
;


END cmn_sde_tapi_pck;
/




package body cmn_sde_tapi_pck
is




function sde_select_row( i_sde_doc_type   in  cmn_sysconfig_data_types.doc_type%type
                       , o_rt_sde   out cmn_sysconfig_data_types%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.sde_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_sde ( i_sde_doc_type   in  cmn_sysconfig_data_types.doc_type%type )
      is 
           select *
             from cmn_sysconfig_data_types sde
            where sde.doc_type = i_sde_doc_type ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_sde( i_sde_doc_type => i_sde_doc_type );
         fetch c_sde into o_rt_sde;
         l_found := c_sde%found;
         close c_sde;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_sde%isopen
         then
            close c_sde;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end sde_select_row;

function sde_select_row_upd( i_sde_doc_type   in  cmn_sysconfig_data_types.doc_type%type
                           , o_rt_sde   out cmn_sysconfig_data_types%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.sde_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_sde ( i_sde_doc_type   in  cmn_sysconfig_data_types.doc_type%type )
   is
           select *
             from cmn_sysconfig_data_types sde
            where sde.doc_type = i_sde_doc_type 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_sde( i_sde_doc_type => i_sde_doc_type );
   fetch c_sde into o_rt_sde;
   l_found := c_sde%found;
   close c_sde;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_sde%isopen
      then
         close c_sde;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end sde_select_row_upd;

procedure sde_lock_row( i_sde_doc_type   in  cmn_sysconfig_data_types.doc_type%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.sde_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_sde ( i_sde_doc_type   in  cmn_sysconfig_data_types.doc_type%type )
     is
             select ''
               from cmn_sysconfig_data_types sde
              where sde.doc_type = i_sde_doc_type 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_sde_doc_type is not null
         then
            begin
                
                sde_lock_row_nowait( i_sde_doc_type => i_sde_doc_type );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_sde( i_sde_doc_type => i_sde_doc_type );
                  close c_sde;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_sde%isopen
         then
            close c_sde;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end sde_lock_row;

procedure sde_lock_row_nowait( i_sde_doc_type   in  cmn_sysconfig_data_types.doc_type%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.sde_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_sde ( i_sde_doc_type   in  cmn_sysconfig_data_types.doc_type%type )
      is
              select ''
                from cmn_sysconfig_data_types sde
               where sde.doc_type = i_sde_doc_type 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_sde_doc_type is not null
         then
            
            open c_sde( i_sde_doc_type => i_sde_doc_type );

            close c_sde;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_sde%isopen
        then
           close c_sde;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'DOC_TYPE = "'||i_sde_doc_type||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end sde_lock_row_nowait;


end cmn_sde_tapi_pck;
/
